Package coinmachine

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    Coin
    A Coin represents metalic money with a value.
    CoinMachine
    A coin purse contains coins.
    Demo
    Console dialog for inserting coins into Coin machine.
    inputUI
    Respresents a coin updater, this progrogram will update, when a coin is inserted and the progress bar will update, if the number of coin is increasing.
    statusUI
    Respresent the status of the capicitor of the coin, the progress bar is depending on the number of coin.
    TestObserver
    To update when the object has changed
